articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Mysterious iron 'bar' discovered in famous nebula - Phys.org
articles.description: A mysterious bar-shaped cloud of iron has been discovered inside the iconic Ring Nebula by a European team led by astronomers at University College London (UCL) and Cardiff University.
articles.content:
A mysterious bar-shaped cloud of iron has been discovered inside the iconic Ring Nebula by a European team led by astronomers at University College London (UCL) and Cardiff University.
